Posts.Content: Apr 27, 2018 07:46AM - edited Apr 27, 2018 07:49AM by bbop53 I had a lumpectomy done on 4/6/18.Nauseous feeling after 3 or 4 days.I was given a prescription. Almost 3 weeks later, still feel nauseous and lightheaded at times. Hope it goes away soon. Nothing seems to help.Any advice will he helpful.Thank you
